 21756 000029B6 8805                    	mov	[di],al		; fake stosb into DS

 21760                                  
 21761                                  NOTKANJ6:
 21762                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 21763 000029BE 3C22                    	cmp	al,'"'	; 22h	; " character

 21766 000029C4 740C                    	jz	short TRYGREATER

 22024 00002AF0 B800AE                  	mov	ax,0AE00h
 22025 00002AF3 CD2F                    	int	2Fh	; - Multiplex -	DOS 3.3+ internal 
 22026                                  			; - INSTALLABLE	COMMAND	- INSTALL CHECK
 22027                                  			; DX = FFFFh,[BX -> command line
 22028                                  			; Return: AL = FFh if this command is a TSR extension 
 22029                                  			;		   to COMMAND.COM
 22030                                  			; AL = 00h if the command should be executed as	usual
 22031                                  	;cmp	al,0
 22032 00002AF5 08C0                    	or	al,al ; 25/02/2023
 22033 00002AF7 C3                      	retn
 22034                                  
 22035                                  	; 25/02/2023
 22036                                  	; INT 2Fh
 22037                                  	; 	AX = AE00h
 22038                                  	; entry:
 22039                                  	; 	DX = magic value FFFFh
 22040                                  	; 	CH = FFh
 22041                                  	; 	CL = length of command line tail
 22042                                  	; 	DS:BX -> command line buffer  -- (offset COMBUF)
 22043                                  	; 	DS:SI -> command name buffer  -- (offset IDLEN)
 22044                                  	; return:
 22045                                  	;	AL = FFh if this command is a TSR extension to COMMAND.COM
 22046                                  	;	AL = 00h if the command should be executed as usual
 22047                                  	;
 22048                                  	; Format of COMMAND.COM command line buffer:
 22049                                  	;	Offset  Size    Description
 22050                                  	;	00h     BYTE    max length of command line, as in INT 21/AH=0Ah
 22051                                  	;	01h     BYTE    count of bytes to follow, excluding terminating 0Dh
 22052                                  	;	N BYTEs command line text, terminated by 0Dh
 22053                                  	;
 22054                                  	; Format of command name buffer:
 22055                                  	;	Offset  Size    Description
 22056                                  	;	00h     BYTE    length of command name
 22057                                  	;	01h    N BYTEs  uppercased command name (blank-padded to 11 chars)
 22058                                  
 22059                                  ;============================================================================
 22060                                  ; TMISC2.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 22061                                  ;============================================================================
 22062                                  ; 05/10/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 22063                                  
 22064                                  ;	More misc routines
 22065                                  
 22066                                  ; MSDOS 3.3 - COMMAND.COM, transient portion/segment offset 1D9Bh
 22067                                  
 22068                                  ; 26/02/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1) COMMAND.COM
 22069                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 - COMMAND.COM, transient portion/segment offset 2BEFh
 22070                                  
 22071                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 22072                                  
 22073                                  SETPATH:
 22074                                  
 22075                                  ; ENTRY PathPos = ptr to string
 22076                                  ;       PathCnt = length of string
 22077                                  ;
 22078                                  ; EXIT  PathPos = ptr to string after pathname
 22079                                  ;       PathCnt = length of rest of string
 22080                                  ;       DX = ptr to pathname in string, made ASCIIZ
 22081                                  ;       DestIsDir = 1 if pathname delimiters appeared in pathname, 0 otherwise
 22082                                  ;       DestInfo = 2 if wildcards (?, *) appeared in pathname, 0 otherwise
 22083                                  ;
 22084                                  ;       A null character is dropped at the end of the pathname. If the
 22085                                  ;       character in that spot previously was CR, it is copied into the
 22086                                  ;       following byte. So there must be at least two two character 
 22087                                  ;       positions in the buffer following the pathname.
 22088                                  
 22089                                  	; 26/02/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1) COMMAND.COM
 22090                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 22091 00002AF8 A1[1D8C]                	mov	ax,[PathCnt]	;AC000; get length of string
 22092 00002AFB 8B36[1F8C]              	mov	si,[PathPos]	;AC000; get start of source buffer
 22093                                  
 22094                                  	; 26/02/2023
 22095                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 22096                                  	;mov	si,80h
 22097                                  	;lodsb
 22098                                  	;xor	ah,ah
 22099                                  	;mov	[PATCNT],ax
 22100                                  	;mov	[PATHPOS],si
 22101                                  GETPATH:
 22102                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 22103 00002AFF C606[CB8C]00            	mov	byte [DestInfo],0
 22104 00002B04 C606[C78C]00            	mov	byte [DestIsDir],0
 22105 00002B09 8B36[1F8C]              	mov	si,[PathPos]	; SI = ptr to string
 22106 00002B0D 8B0E[1D8C]              	mov	cx,[PathCnt]	; CX = string length
 22107 00002B11 89F2                    	mov	dx,si		; DX = ptr to string
 22108 00002B13 E34D                    	jcxz	PATHDONE	; string length is zero, we're done
 22109 00002B15 51                      	push	cx		; save string length
 22110 00002B16 56                      	push	si		; save ptr to string
 22111 00002B17 E86EFC                  	call	SWITCH
 22112                                  
 22113                                  ;       After Switch, SI has been scanned past any switches, and
 22114                                  ;       switches that COMMAND intrinsically recognizes are recorded in AX.
 22115                                  
 22116 00002B1A A3[218C]                	mov	[PathSw],ax	; PathSw = switch occurrence mask
 22117 00002B1D 5B                      	pop	bx		; BX = ptr to original string
 22118 00002B1E 29F3                    	sub	bx,si		; BX = -(# chars scanned by Switch)
 22119 00002B20 59                      	pop	cx		; CX = string length
 22120 00002B21 01D9                    	add	cx,bx		; CX = string length from current SI
 22121 00002B23 89F2                    	mov	dx,si		; DX = ptr to current string
 22122                                  SKIPPATH:
 22123                                  	; 26/02/2023
 22124                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 22125 00002B25 C606[4E8E]00            	mov	byte [KPARSE],0
 22126                                  SKIPPATH2:
 22127 00002B2A E336                    	jcxz	PATHDONE	; string length is zero, we're done
 22128 00002B2C 49                      	dec	cx		; CX = length left after next char
 22129 00002B2D AC                      	lodsb			; AL = next char of string
 22130                                  				; SI = ptr to char after this one
 22131                                  	; 26/02/2023
 22132 00002B2E E897F8                  	call	testkanj
 22133 00002B31 7408                    	jz	short TESTPPSEP
 22134 00002B33 49                      	dec	cx
 22135 00002B34 46                      	inc	si
 22136 00002B35 FE06[4E8E]              	inc	byte [KPARSE]
 22137 00002B39 EBEF                    	jmp	short SKIPPATH2
 22138                                  TESTPPSEP:
 22139 00002B3B E83AFB                  	call	pathchrcmp	; compare AL to path delimiter char
 22140 00002B3E 7504                    	jnz	short TESTPMETA	; it's not a path delim
 22141 00002B40 FE06[C78C]              	inc	byte [DestIsDir]
 22142                                  				; DestIsDir = 1, signalling path char
 22143                                  TESTPMETA:
 22144 00002B44 3C3F                    	cmp	al,'?'
 22145 00002B46 7505                    	jne	short TESTPSTAR	; char is not '?'
 22146 00002B48 800E[CB8C]02            	or	byte [DestInfo],2 ; DestInfo = 2, signalling wildcard
 22147                                  TESTPSTAR:
 22148 00002B4D 3C2A                    	cmp	al,'*'
 22149                                  	;cmp	al,[STAR] ; MSDOS 3.3	
 22150 00002B4F 7505                    	jne	short TESTPDELIM ; char is not '*'
 22151 00002B51 800E[CB8C]02            	or	byte [DestInfo],2 ; DestInfo = 2, signalling wildcard
 22152                                  TESTPDELIM:
 22153 00002B56 E899FA                  	call	DELIM		; compare AL to all delimiters
 22154 00002B59 7406                    	jz	short PATHDONEDEC ; delimiter found, back up & leave
 22155 00002B5B 3A06[C48A]              	cmp	al,[SWITCHAR]
 22156 00002B5F 75C4                    	jne	short SKIPPATH	; char isn't switch, go get next char
 22157                                  PATHDONEDEC:
 22158 00002B61 4E                      	dec	si		; SI = ptr to char after pathname
 22159                                  PATHDONE:
 22160 00002B62 30C0                    	xor	al,al		; AL = NULL
 22161 00002B64 8604                    	xchg	al,[si]		; place NULL after pathname
 22162 00002B66 46                      	inc	si		; SI = ptr to byte after NULL
 22163 00002B67 3C0D                    	cmp	al,0Dh		; were we at end of line?
 22164 00002B69 7502                    	jne	short NOPSTORE	; not EOL, finish up
 22165 00002B6B 8804                    	mov	[si],al		; save EOL after NULL
 22166                                  NOPSTORE:
 22167 00002B6D 8936[1F8C]              	mov	[PathPos],si	; PathPos = ptr to char after NULL
 22168 00002B71 890E[1D8C]              	mov	[PathCnt],cx	; PathCnt = length of string left
 22169                                  SETPATH_RETN:
 22170 00002B75 C3                      	retn
 22171                                  
 22172                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22173                                  
 22174                                  PGETARG:
 22175 00002B76 BE8000                  	mov	si,80h
 22176 00002B79 AC                      	lodsb
 22177 00002B7A 08C0                    	or	al,al
 22178 00002B7C 74F7                    	jz	short SETPATH_RETN
 22179 00002B7E E80300                  	call	PSCANOFF
 22180 00002B81 3C0D                    	cmp	al,0Dh
 22181 00002B83 C3                      	retn

 22185                                  PSCANOFF:

 22189 00002B8A 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';' ; 3Bh
 22190 00002B8C 75F6                    	jne	short PSCANOFF	; ';' is not a delimiter
 22191                                  PSCANOFFD:

 22193 00002B8F C3                      	retn

 22470                                  
 22471                                  TriageError:  ; MSDOS 6.0
 22472                                  
 22473                                  ; TriageError will examine the return from a carry-set system call and
 22474                                  ; return the correct error if applicable.
 22475                                  ;
 22476                                  ;   Inputs:	outputs from a carry-settable system call
 22477                                  ;		No system calls may be done in the interrim
 22478                                  ;   Outputs:	If carry was set on input
 22479                                  ;		   carry set on output
 22480                                  ;		   DX contains trangroup offset to printf message
 22481                                  ;		else
 22482                                  ;		   No registers changed
 22483                                  
 22484                                  ; MSDOS 3.3 - COMMAND.COM, transient portion/segment offset 1EEEh
 22485                                  
 22486                                  ; 26/02/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1) COMMAND.COM
 22487                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 - COMMAND.COM, transient portion/segment offset 2D92h
 22488

 22504                                  			; BX = version code (0000h for DOS 3.x)

 22539                                  
 22540                                  ; ****************************************************************
 22541                                  ; *
 22542                                  ; * ROUTINE:	 MOVE_TO_SRCBUF
 22543                                  ; *
 22544                                  ; * FUNCTION:	 Move ASCIIZ string from DS:SI to SRCBUF.  Change
 22545                                  ; *		 terminating 0 to 0dH.	Set PATHCNT to length of
 22546                                  ; *		 string.  Set PATHPOS to start of SRCBUF.
 22547                                  ; *
 22548                                  ; * INPUT:	 DS:SI points to ASCIIZ string
 22549                                  ; *		 ES    points to TRANGROUP
 22550                                  ; *
 22551                                  ; * OUTPUT:	 SRCBUF filled in with string terminated by 0dH
 22552                                  ; *		 PATHCNT set to length of string
 22553                                  ; *		 PATHPOS set to start of SRCBUF
 22554                                  ; *		 CX,AX	 changed
 22555                                  ; *
 22556                                  ; ****************************************************************
 22557                                  
 22558                                  	; 26/02/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1) COMMAND.COM
 22559                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 COMMAND.COM - TRANGROUP:2CABh
 22560                                  Move_To_SrcBuf:
 22561 00002CBA 56                      	push	si			;AN000;  save si,di
 22562 00002CBB 57                      	push	di			;AN000;
 22563 00002CBC 51                      	push	cx			;AN000;
 22564 00002CBD BF[2F8D]                	mov	di,SrcBuf		;AN000;  set ES:DI to srcbuf
 22565 00002CC0 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			;AN000; clear cx for counint
 22566 00002CC2 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			;AN000; clear ax
 22567 00002CC4 57                      	push	di			;AN000; save start of srcbuf
 22568 00002CC5 AC                      	lodsb				;AN000; get a character from DS:SI
 22569                                  mts_get_chars:				;AN000;
 22570                                  	;cmp	al,0			;AN000; was it a null char?
 22571 00002CC6 20C0                    	and 	al,al ; al = 0 ?
 22572 00002CC8 7405                    	jz	short mts_end_string	;AN000; yes - exit
 22573 00002CCA AA                      	stosb				;AN000; no - store it in srcbuf
 22574 00002CCB 41                      	inc	cx			;AN000; increment length count
 22575 00002CCC AC                      	lodsb				;AN000; get a character from DS:SI
 22576 00002CCD EBF7                    	jmp	short mts_get_chars	;AN000; go check it
 22577                                  mts_end_string: 			;AN000; we've reached the end of line
 22578                                  	;mov	al,END_OF_LINE_IN	;AN000; store 0Dh in srcbuf
 22579 00002CCF B00D                    	mov	al,0Dh
 22580 00002CD1 AA                      	stosb				;AN000;
 22581 00002CD2 5F                      	pop	di			;AN000; restore start of srcbuf
 22582 00002CD3 0E                      	push	cs			;AN000; set DS to local segment
 22583 00002CD4 1F                      	pop	ds			;AN000;
 22584 00002CD5 890E[1D8C]              	mov	[PathCnt],cx		;AN000; set patchcnt to length count
 22585 00002CD9 893E[1F8C]              	mov	[PathPos],di		;AN000; set pathpos to start of srcbuf
 22586 00002CDD 59                      	pop	cx			;AN000; restore cx,di,si
 22587 00002CDE 5F                      	pop	di			;AN000;
 22588 00002CDF 5E                      	pop	si			;AN000;
 22589 00002CE0 C3                      	retn				;AN000; exit

 23263                                  ; *
 23264                                  ; * ROUTINE:	 GETDAT - Prompt user for date
 23265                                  ; *
 23266                                  ; * FUNCTION:	 Gets the date format from the COUNTRY DEPENDENT
 23267                                  ; *		 INFORMATION and issues the "Enter new date"

 23269                                  ; *		 is reset to get a date from the command line.
 23270                                  ; *		 The PARSE_DATE blocks are then reset and the

 23339                                  ; ****************************************************************
 23340                                  ; *
 23341                                  ; * ROUTINE:	 GETTIME - Prompt user for time
 23342                                  ; *
 23343                                  ; * FUNCTION:	 Gets the time format from the COUNTRY DEPENDENT
 23344                                  ; *		 INFORMATION and issues the "Enter new time"
 23345                                  ; *		 message. COMBUF is reset to get a time from the
 23346                                  ; *		 command line. The PARSE_TIME blocks are then
 23347                                  ; *		 reset and the PARSE function call is issued.
 23348                                  ; *
 23349                                  ; * INPUT:	 NONE
 23350                                  ; *
 23351                                  ; * OUTPUT:	 COMBUF
 23352                                  ; *		 PARSER RETURN CODES
 23353                                  ; *
 23354                                  ; ****************************************************************
 23355

 23357                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 COMMAND.COM - TRANGROUP:313Dh
 23358                                  GETTIM:

 23360 00003018 BA[2E80]                	mov	dx,NewTim_Ptr
 23361 0000301B E8051E                  	call	std_printf
 23362                                  
 23363                                  	; 28/02/2023
 23364 0000301E BF[1D85]                	mov	di,PARSE_TIME
 23365 00003021 EBD6                    	jmp	short gettim_p

 23372                                  ;	call	SetInitFlag		;  prompting for time.
 23373                                  ;	int	21h			; Get input line
 23374                                  ;	; 28/02/2023

 23393                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 23394                                  
 23395                                  ;Skip_white: Skips over the whitespace chars that could be present after
 23396                                  ;the '=' sign in the environment variable before the actual path.
 23397                                  ;
 23398                                  ;	ENTRY:	ds:si = arguments of the environment variable
 23399                                  ;
 23400                                  ;	EXIT:	ds:si = start of the path
 23401                                  ;
 23402                                  ;	REGISTERS AFFECTED: ax
 23403                                  
 23404                                  	; 28/02/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1) COMMAND.COM
 23405                                  skip_white:
 23406 00003023 FC                      	cld
 23407                                  skw_lp:
 23408 00003024 AC                      	lodsb
 23409 00003025 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '			;blank char?
 23410 00003027 74FB                    	jz	short skw_lp		;yes, skip it
 23411 00003029 3C09                    	cmp	al,9			;tab char?
 23412 0000302B 74F7                    	jz	short skw_lp		;yes, skip it
 23413 0000302D 4E                      	dec	si			;point at first non-white
 23414 0000302E C3                      	retn
 23415                                  
 23416                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23417                                  
 23418                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 23419                                  
 23420                                  ;Copy_pipe_path: This routine copies the path from the TEMP environment
 23421                                  ;variable into the path buffers Pipe1 & Pipe2.
 23422                                  ;
 23423                                  ;	ENTRY:	ds:si = path to be copied
 23424                                  ;		es = RESGROUP
 23425                                  ;
 23426                                  ;	EXIT:	Path copied into Pipe1 and Pipe2.
 23427                                  ;
 23428                                  ;	REGISTERS AFFECTED: si, di, cx, ax
 23429                                  
 23430                                  	; 28/02/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1) COMMAND.COM
 23431                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 COMMAND.COM - TRANGROUP:3174h
 23432                                  
 23433                                  copy_pipe_path:
 23434 0000302F B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,0FFFFh ; 65535
 23435 00003032 30C0                    	xor	al,al
 23436                                  
 23437 00003034 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 23438 00003036 06                      	push	es			;save es
 23439 00003037 1E                      	push	ds
 23440 00003038 07                      	pop	es			;es:di = path to be copied
 23441                                  	
 23442 00003039 FC                      	cld
 23443 0000303A 57                      	push	di
 23444 0000303B F2AE                    	repnz	scasb			;look for the null char
 23445 0000303D 5F                      	pop	di
 23446                                  
 23447 0000303E 07                      	pop	es			;es = RESGROUP again
 23448                                  
 23449 0000303F F7D1                    	not	cx			;length including the null
 23450                                  
 23451                                  	;;mov	di,320h ; MSDOS 5.0 COMMAND.COM ; (RESGROUP:EndInit)
 23452                                  	;mov	di,offset DATARES:Pipe1
 23453 00003041 BF[1A02]                	mov	di,Pipe1  ; (offset RESGROUP:EndInit)
 23454 00003044 57                      	push	di
 23455 00003045 51                      	push	cx			
 23456 00003046 F3A4                    	rep	movsb			;copy path into Pipe1
 23457 00003048 59                      	pop	cx
 23458 00003049 5F                      	pop	di
 23459                                  
 23460 0000304A 1E                      	push	ds
 23461 0000304B 06                      	push	es
 23462 0000304C 1F                      	pop	ds			;ds:si = Pipe1
 23463 0000304D 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 23464                                  	;;mov	di,36Fh ; MSDOS 5.0 COMMAND.COM ; (RESGROUP:EndInit+79)
 23465                                  	;mov	di,offset DATARES:Pipe2	;es:di = Pipe2
 23466 0000304F BF[6902]                	mov	di,Pipe2  ; (offset RESGROUP:EndInit+79)
 23467 00003052 F3A4                    	rep	movsb			;copy path into Pipe2
 23468 00003054 1F                      	pop	ds
 23469 00003055 C3                      	retn
 23470

 23472                                  %if 0

 23474                                  ;============================================================================
 23475                                  ; TCODE4.ASM, MSDOS 2.11 (& MSDOS 3.3), 1983 (& 1987)
 23476                                  ;============================================================================
 23477                                  ; 05/10/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 23478                                  
 23479                                  ; DATE - Gets and sets the time
 23480                                  
 23481                                  ; MSDOS 3.3 - COMMAND.COM, transient portion/segment offset 20C0h
 23482                                  
 23483                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23484                                  
 23485                                  DATE_CXDX:
 23486                                  	mov	bx,cx
 23487                                  
 23488                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23489                                  
 23490                                  P_DATE:
 23491                                  	mov	ax,bx
 23492                                  	mov	cx,dx
 23493                                  	mov	dl,100
 23494                                  	div	dl
 23495                                  	xchg	al,ah
 23496                                  	xchg	ax,dx
 23497                                  	mov	bh,'0'-' ' ; 10h  ; Enable leading zero suppression
 23498                                  	;mov	ax,[INTERNATVARS]
 23499                                  	mov	ax,[INTERNATVARS+INTERNAT_BLOCK.Date_tim_format]
 23500                                  	or	ax,ax
 23501                                  	jz	short USPDAT
 23502                                  	dec	ax
 23503                                  	jz	short EUPDAT
 23504                                  	mov	bh,0	 ; Disable leading zero suppression	
 23505                                  	call	P_YR
 23506                                  	call	P_DSEP
 23507                                  	call	P_MON
 23508                                  	call	P_DSEP
 23509                                  	call	P_DAY
 23510                                  	retn
 23511                                  
 23512                                  USPDAT:
 23513                                  	call	P_MON
 23514                                  	call	P_DSEP
 23515                                  	call	P_DAY
 23516                                  PLST:
 23517                                  	call	P_DSEP
 23518                                  	call	P_YR
 23519                                  	retn
 23520                                  
 23521                                  EUPDAT:
 23522                                  	call	P_DAY
 23523                                  	call	P_DSEP
 23524                                  	call	P_MON
 23525                                  	jmp	short PLST
 23526                                  
 23527                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23528                                  
 23529                                  P_MON:
 23530                                  	mov	al,ch
 23531                                  	call	OUT2
 23532                                  	retn
 23533                                  
 23534                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23535                                  
 23536                                  P_DSEP:
 23537                                  	;mov	al,[DATE_SEP] ; INTERNATVARS+11
 23538                                  	mov	al,[INTERNATVARS+INTERNAT_BLOCK.Date_sep]
 23539                                  	stosb
 23540                                  	retn
 23541                                  
 23542                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23543                                  
 23544                                  P_DAY:
 23545                                  	mov	al,cl
 23546                                  	call	OUT2
 23547                                  	retn
 23548                                  
 23549                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23550                                  
 23551                                  P_YR:
 23552                                  	mov	al,dh
 23553                                  	or	al,al
 23554                                  	jz	short TWODIGYR	; Two instead of 4 digit year
 23555                                  	call	OUT2
 23556                                  TWODIGYR:
 23557                                  	mov	al,dl
 23558                                  	call	OUT2
 23559                                  DATE_RETN:
 23560                                  	retn
 23561                                  
 23562                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23563                                  
 23564                                  DATE:				 ; Accepting argument for date inline
 23565                                  	mov	si,81h
 23566                                  	call	SCANOFF
 23567                                  	cmp	al,0Dh
 23568                                  	jz	short PRMTDAT
 23569                                  	jmp	short COMDAT
 23570                                  
 23571                                  	;nop
 23572                                  PRMTDAT:
 23573                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 23574                                  	mov	dx,CURDATPTR
 23575                                  	call	STD_PRINTF	; Print "Current date is "	
 23576                                  	call	PRINT_DATE
 23577                                  GETDAT:	
 23578                                  	mov	dx,NEWDATPTR
 23579                                  	call	STD_PRINTF	 ; Print "Enter new date: "
 23580                                  
 23581                                  	mov	ax,INTERNATIONAL*256 ; 3800h 
 23582                                  				; Determine what format the date
 23583                                  	mov	dx,5Ch		;  should be entered in and
 23584                                  	int	21h	; DOS -	2+ - GET COUNTRY-DEPENDENT INFORMATION
 23585                                  			; get current-country info
 23586                                  			; DS:DX	-> buffer for returned info
 23587                                  	mov	si,dx		;  print a message describing it
 23588                                  	lodsw
 23589                                  	mov	dx,USADATPTR	; get mm-dd-yy
 23590                                  	dec	ax
 23591                                  	js	short PRINTFORMAT
 23592                                  	mov	dx,EURDATPTR	; get dd-mm-yy
 23593                                  	jz	short PRINTFORMAT
 23594                                  	mov	dx,JAPDATPTR	; get yy-mm-dd
 23595                                  PRINTFORMAT:
 23596                                  	call	STD_PRINTF
 23597                                  	mov	ah,Std_Con_String_Input	; 0Ah
 23598                                  	mov	dx,COMBUF
 23599                                  	mov	cx,INITSPECIAL ;2 ; Set bit in InitFlag that indicate
 23600                                  	call	SETINITFLAG	;  prompting for date.
 23601                                  	int	21h		; Get input line
 23602                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Reset bit in InitFlag that indicates
 23603                                  	call	SETINITFLAG	;  prompting for date.
 23604                                  	call	CRLF2
 23605                                  	mov	si,COMBUF+2
 23606                                  	cmp	byte [si],0Dh
 23607                                  	jz	short DATE_RETN
 23608                                  COMDAT:
 23609                                  	;mov	ax,[INTERNATVARS]
 23610                                  	mov	ax,[INTERNATVARS+INTERNAT_BLOCK.Date_tim_format]
 23611                                  	or	ax,ax
 23612                                  	jz	short USSDAT
 23613                                  	dec	ax
 23614                                  	jz	short EUSDAT
 23615                                  	call	GET_YR
 23616                                  	jc	short DATERRJ
 23617                                  	call	GET_DSEP
 23618                                  	jc	short DATERRJ
 23619                                  	call	GET_MON
 23620                                  	jc	short DATERRJ
 23621                                  	call	GET_DSEP
 23622                                  	jc	short DATERRJ
 23623                                  	call	GET_DAY
 23624                                  DAT_SET:
 23625                                  	jnc	short DATSET
 23626                                  	jmp	DATERR
 23627                                  
 23628                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23629                                  
 23630                                  DATSET:
 23631                                  	lodsb
 23632                                  	cmp	al,' '
 23633                                  	jz	short DATSET
 23634                                  	cmp	al,9
 23635                                  	jz	short DATSET
 23636                                  	cmp	al,0Dh
 23637                                  	jnz	short DATERR
 23638                                  	mov	ah,SET_DATE ; 2Bh
 23639                                  	int	21h	; DOS -	SET CURRENT DATE
 23640                                  			; DL = day,DH = month,	CX = year
 23641                                  			; Return: AL = 00h if no error 
 23642                                  			; 	     = FFh if bad value sent to routine
 23643                                  	or	al,al
 23644                                  	jnz	short DATERR
 23645                                  DAT_SET_RETN:
 23646                                  	retn
 23647                                  
 23648                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23649                                  
 23650                                  USSDAT:
 23651                                  	call	GET_MON
 23652                                  	jb	short DATERR
 23653                                  	call	GET_DSEP
 23654                                  DATERRJ:
 23655                                  	jc	short DATERR
 23656                                  	call	GET_DAY
 23657                                  TGET:
 23658                                  	jc	short DATERR
 23659                                  	call	GET_DSEP
 23660                                  	jc	short DATERR
 23661                                  	call	GET_YR
 23662                                  	jmp	short DAT_SET
 23663                                  
 23664                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23665                                  
 23666                                  EUSDAT:
 23667                                  	call	GET_DAY
 23668                                  	jc	short DATERR
 23669                                  	call	GET_DSEP
 23670                                  	jc	short DATERR
 23671                                  	call	GET_MON
 23672                                  	jmp	short TGET
 23673                                  
 23674                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23675                                  
 23676                                  GET_MON:
 23677                                  	call	GETNUM		; Get one or two digit number
 23678                                  	jc	short DAT_SET_RETN
 23679                                  	mov	dh,ah		; Put in position
 23680                                  	retn
 23681                                  
 23682                                  
 23683                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23684                                  
 23685                                  GET_DAY:
 23686                                  		call	GETNUM
 23687                                  		mov	dl,ah		; Put in position
 23688                                  GET_DAY_RETN:
 23689                                  		retn
 23690                                  
 23691                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23692                                  
 23693                                  GET_YR:
 23694                                  	call	GETNUM
 23695                                  	jc	short GET_DAY_RETN
 23696                                  	mov	cx,1900
 23697                                  	call	GET_DSEP
 23698                                  	pushf
 23699                                  	dec	si
 23700                                  	popf
 23701                                  	jz	short BIAS
 23702                                  	cmp	byte [si],0Dh
 23703                                  	je	short BIAS
 23704                                  	cmp	byte [si],' '
 23705                                  	je	short BIAS
 23706                                  	cmp	byte [si],9
 23707                                  	je	short BIAS
 23708                                  	push	bx
 23709                                  	mov	bl,100
 23710                                  	mov	al,ah
 23711                                  	mul	bl
 23712                                  	pop	bx
 23713                                  	mov	cx,ax
 23714                                  	call	GETNUM
 23715                                  	jc	short GET_DAY_RETN
 23716                                  BIAS:
 23717                                  	mov	al,ah
 23718                                  	mov	ah,0
 23719                                  	add	cx,ax
 23720                                  BIAS_RETN:
 23721                                  	retn
 23722                                  
 23723                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23724                                  
 23725                                  DATERR:
 23726                                  	mov	dx,BADDATPTR
 23727                                  	call	STD_PRINTF
 23728                                  	jmp	GETDAT
 23729                                  
 23730                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23731                                  
 23732                                  GET_DSEP:
 23733                                  	lodsb
 23734                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 23735                                  	je	short BIAS_RETN
 23736                                  	;cmp	al,'.'
 23737                                  	cmp	al,[DOT_CHR]
 23738                                  	je	short BIAS_RETN
 23739                                  	;cmp	al,'-'
 23740                                  	cmp	al,[CHAR_SUB]
 23741                                  	je	short BIAS_RETN
 23742                                  	stc
 23743                                  	retn
 23744                                  
 23745                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23746                                  
 23747                                  ; TIME gets and sets the time
 23748                                  
 23749                                  CTIME:
 23750                                  	mov	si,81h		; Accepting argument for time inline
 23751                                  	call	SCANOFF
 23752                                  	cmp	al,0Dh
 23753                                  	je	short PRMTTIM
 23754                                  	mov	bx,2E3Ah ; ":."
 23755                                  	call	INLINE
 23756                                  	jmp	COMTIM
 23757                                  
 23758                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23759                                  
 23760                                  PRINT_TIME:
 23761                                  	mov	ah,Get_Time ; 2Ch ; Get time in CX:DX
 23762                                  	int	21h	; DOS -	GET CURRENT TIME
 23763                                  			; Return: CH = hours,CL = minutes,DH = seconds
 23764                                  			; DL = hundredths of seconds
 23765                                  	push	di
 23766                                  	push	es
 23767                                  	push	cs
 23768                                  	pop	es
 23769                                  	mov	di,CHARBUF
 23770                                  	mov	bl,1	; Always 24 hour time
 23771                                  	call	P_TIME
 23772                                  	xor	ax,ax
 23773                                  	stosb
 23774                                  	mov	dx,CHARBUF
 23775                                  	mov	[STRING_PTR_2],dx
 23776                                  	mov	dx,STRINGBUF2PTR
 23777                                  	call	STD_PRINTF
 23778                                  	pop	es
 23779                                  	pop	di
 23780                                  P_TIME_RETN:
 23781                                  	retn
 23782                                  
 23783                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23784                                  
 23785                                  P_TIME:
 23786                                  	mov	al,ch	
 23787                                  	test	bl,7Fh		; Ignore high bit
 23788                                  	jnz	short T24	; 24 hr time?
 23789                                  	mov	bh,'a'		; Assume A.M.
 23790                                  	cmp	al,12		; In the afternoon?
 23791                                  	jb	short MORN
 23792                                  	mov	bh,'p'
 23793                                  	jz	short MORN
 23794                                  	sub	al,12		; Keep it to 12 hours or less
 23795                                  MORN:
 23796                                  	or	al,al		; Before 1 am?
 23797                                  	jnz	short T24
 23798                                  	mov	al,12
 23799                                  T24:
 23800                                  	push	bx
 23801                                  	mov	bh,'0'-' ' ; 10h ; Enable leading zero suppression
 23802                                  	call	OUT2
 23803                                  	call	P_TSEP
 23804                                  	mov	al,cl
 23805                                  	call	OUT2
 23806                                  	pop	bx
 23807                                  	push	bx
 23808                                  	test	bl,80h
 23809                                  	jnz	short PAP	; If from DIR, go directly to am pm
 23810                                  	mov	bh,0		; Disable leading zero suppression
 23811                                  	call	P_TSEP
 23812                                  	mov	al,dh
 23813                                  	call	OUT2
 23814                                  	;mov	al,'.'
 23815                                  	mov	al,[DECIMAL_SEP]
 23816                                  	stosb
 23817                                  	mov	al,dl
 23818                                  	call	OUT2
 23819                                  PAP:
 23820                                  	pop	bx
 23821                                  	test	bl,7Fh		; Ignore high bit
 23822                                  	jnz	short P_TIME_RETN
 23823                                  	mov	al,bh
 23824                                  	stosb
 23825                                  	retn
 23826                                  
 23827                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23828                                  
 23829                                  P_TSEP:
 23830                                  	;mov	al,[TIME_SEP]
 23831                                  	mov	al,[INTERNATVARS+INTERNAT_BLOCK.Time_sep]
 23832                                  	stosb
 23833                                  P_TSEP_RETN:
 23834                                  	retn
 23835                                  
 23836                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23837                                  
 23838                                  PRMTTIM:
 23839                                  	mov	dx,CURTIMPTR
 23840                                  	call	STD_PRINTF	; Print "Current time is "
 23841                                  	call	PRINT_TIME
 23842                                  GETTIM:
 23843                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Initialize hours and minutes to zero
 23844                                  	mov	dx,NEWTIMPTR
 23845                                  	call	STD_PRINTF
 23846                                  	;mov	bx,':.'
 23847                                  	mov	bx,[TIMECHARS] 
 23848                                  	call	GETBUF
 23849                                  COMTIM:
 23850                                  	jz	short P_TSEP_RETN ; If no time present, don't change it	
 23851                                  	jc	short TIMEERR
 23852                                  	mov	cx,dx
 23853                                  	xor	dx,dx
 23854                                  	lodsb
 23855                                  	cmp	al,0Dh
 23856                                  	je	short SAVTIM
 23857                                  	cmp	al,' '
 23858                                  	je	short GOTSEC2
 23859                                  	cmp	al,9
 23860                                  	je	short GOTSEC2
 23861                                  	cmp	al,bl
 23862                                  	je	short GOTSEC
 23863                                  	cmp	al,bh
 23864                                  	jne	short TIMEERR
 23865                                  GOTSEC:
 23866                                  	call	GETNUM
 23867                                  	jc	short TIMEERR
 23868                                  	mov	dh,ah		; Position seconds
 23869                                  	lodsb
 23870                                  	cmp	al,0Dh
 23871                                  	je	short SAVTIM
 23872                                  	cmp	al,' '
 23873                                  	je	short GOTSEC2
 23874                                  	cmp	al,9
 23875                                  	je	short GOTSEC2
 23876                                  	;cmp	al,'.'
 23877                                  	cmp	al,[DECIMAL_SEP]
 23878                                  	jne	short TIMEERR
 23879                                  	call	GETNUM
 23880                                  	jc	short TIMEERR
 23881                                  	mov	dl,ah
 23882                                  GOTSEC2:
 23883                                  	lodsb
 23884                                  	cmp	al,' '
 23885                                  	je	short GOTSEC2
 23886                                  	cmp	al,9
 23887                                  	je	short GOTSEC2
 23888                                  	cmp	al,0Dh
 23889                                  	jne	short TIMEERR
 23890                                  SAVTIM:
 23891                                  	mov	ah,SET_TIME ; 2Dh
 23892                                  	int	21h	; DOS -	SET CURRENT TIME
 23893                                  			; CH = hours,CL = minutes,DH = seconds,
 23894                                  			;		DL = hundredths of seconds
 23895                                  			; Return: AL = 00h if no error 
 23896                                  			;	     = FFh if bad value sent to routine
 23897                                  	or	al,al
 23898                                  P_TSEP_JRETN:
 23899                                  	jz	short P_TSEP_RETN ; Error in time?
 23900                                  TIMEERR:
 23901                                  	mov	dx,BADTIMPTR
 23902                                  	call	STD_PRINTF	; Print "Enter new time: "
 23903                                  	jmp	short GETTIM
 23904                                  
 23905                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23906                                  
 23907                                  GETBUF:
 23908                                  	mov	ah,Std_Con_String_Input ; 0Ah
 23909                                  	mov	dx,COMBUF
 23910                                  	mov	cx,2
 23911                                  	call	SETINITFLAG
 23912                                  	int	21h		; Get input line
 23913                                  	xor	cx,cx
 23914                                  	call	SETINITFLAG
 23915                                  	call	CRLF2
 23916                                  	mov	si,COMBUF+2
 23917                                  	cmp	byte [si],0Dh	; Check if new time entered
 23918                                  	jz	short P_TSEP_JRETN
 23919                                  
 23920                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23921                                  
 23922                                  INLINE:
 23923                                  	call	GETNUM		; Get one or two digit number
 23924                                  	jnb	short INLINE1
 23925                                  	retn
 23926                                  INLINE1:
 23927                                  	mov	dh,ah		; Put in position
 23928                                  	lodsb
 23929                                  	cmp	al,bl
 23930                                  	jz	short NEXT
 23931                                  	cmp	al,bh
 23932                                  	jz	short NEXT
 23933                                  	dec	si		; Clears zero flag
 23934                                  	clc
 23935                                  	mov	dl,0
 23936                                  	retn			; Time may have only an hour specified
 23937                                  NEXT:
 23938                                  	call	GETNUM
 23939                                  	mov	dl,ah		; Put in position
 23940                                  INLINE_RETN:
 23941                                  	retn
 23942                                  
 23943                                  ;============================================================================
 23944                                  ; TCODE5.ASM, MSDOS 2.11 (& MSDOS 3.3), 1983 (& 1987)
 23945                                  ;============================================================================
 23946                                  ; 05/10/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 23947                                  
 23948                                  ; MSDOS 3.3 - COMMAND.COM, transient portion/segment offset 2370h
 23949                                  
 23950                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23951                                  
 23952                                  GETNUM:
 23953                                  	call	INDIG
 23954                                  	jb	short INLINE_RETN
 23955                                  	mov	ah,al		; Save first digit
 23956                                  	call	INDIG		; Another digit?
 23957                                  	jb	short OKRET
 23958                                  	aad			; Convert unpacked BCD to decimal
 23959                                  	mov	ah,al
 23960                                  OKRET:
 23961                                  	or	al,1
 23962                                  GETNUM_RETN:
 23963                                  	retn
 23964                                  
 23965                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23966                                  
 23967                                  INDIG:
 23968                                  	mov	al,[si]
 23969                                  	sub	al,'0'
 23970                                  	jc	short GETNUM_RETN
 23971                                  	cmp	al,10
 23972                                  	cmc
 23973                                  	jc	short GETNUM_RETN
 23974                                  	inc	si
 23975                                  	retn
 23976                                  
 23977                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 23978                                  
 23979                                  OUT2:				; Output binary number as two ASCII digits
 23980                                  	aam			; Convert binary to unpacked BCD
 23981                                  	xchg	al,ah
 23982                                  	or	ax,3030h	; Add "0" bias to both digits
 23983                                  	cmp	al,'0'		; Is MSD zero?
 23984                                  	jnz	short NOSUP
 23985                                  	sub	al,bh		; Suppress leading zero if enabled
 23986                                  NOSUP:
 23987                                  	mov	bh,0		; Disable zero suppression
 23988                                  	stosw
 23989                                  	retn
 23990                                  
 23991                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23992                                  	;stosb
 23993                                  	;retn
 23994

 23996                                  ; TPIPE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 23997                                  ;============================================================================
 23998                                  ; 03/10/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 23999                                  
 24000                                  ; MSDOS 3.3 - COMMAND.COM, transient portion/segment offset 23A3h
 24001                                  
 24002                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 24003                                  
 24004                                  ; Set the special flag in the INIT flag to the value in CX.
 24005                                  
 24006                                  SETINITFLAG:
 24007                                  	mov	ds,[RESSEG]
 24008                                  	;and	byte [INITFLAG],0FDh
 24009                                  	and	byte [INITFLAG],~INITSPECIAL
 24010                                  	or	byte [INITFLAG],cl
 24011                                  	push	cs
 24012                                  	pop	ds
 24013                                  	retn
 24014                                  
 24015                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 24016                                  
 24017                                  PIPEOFF:
 24018                                  	push	ds
 24019                                  	push	ax
 24020                                  	mov	ds,[cs:RESSEG]
 24021                                  	xor	al,al
 24022                                  	xchg	al,byte [PIPEFLAG]
 24023                                  	or	al,al
 24024                                  	jz	short PIPEOFFDONE
 24025                                  	shr	byte [ECHOFLAG],1
 24026                                  PIPEOFFDONE:
 24027                                  	pop	ax
 24028                                  	pop	ds
 24029                                  	retn
